title: SQL ServerNCHAR()Function

metadata.description: Learn about SQL ServerNCHAR()Function with clear explanations and practical examples.

content_sections.title: Details
content_sections.content:
❯
Example
Return the Unicode character based on the number code 65:
SELECT NCHAR(65) AS NumberCodeToUnicode;

Definition and Usage
The NCHAR() function returns the Unicode character based on the number code.
Syntax
NCHAR(
number_code
)
Parameter Values
Parameter
Description
number_code
Required. The number code in the Unicode standard to return the 
    character for
Technical Details
Works in:
SQL Server (starting with 2008), Azure SQL Database, Azure SQL Data 
  Warehouse, Parallel Data Warehouse

❯
★
+1

summary: This tutorial covers SQL ServerNCHAR()Function concepts and techniques. You'll learn how to use SQL ServerNCHAR()Function effectively, including key principles, common patterns, and practical examples. By the end of this tutorial, you'll have a solid understanding of SQL ServerNCHAR()Function and how to apply it in your projects.
